Welcome to Research in Health Economics! We're going to have a great time this semester and learn a ton about causal inference and health policy.

### Objectives

- Introduce the class, goals, structure, etc.
- Review data manipulation in `R` using the `tidyverse`
- Demonstrate `RStudio` in AWS and clone repo

### Activities 

- Set up `R`, `RStudio`, and `Git` on your own machines
- or, get comfortable with AWS access
- Clone first repository
